info.title: Voyant API
info.description: Autonomous Data Intelligence for AI Agents

get.description:
Liveness probe - Is the service running?

Returns 200 if service is alive, regardless of external dependencies.
Kubernetes uses this to restart crashed pods.

Performance Engineer: O(1) check, <1ms response time

Readiness probe - Is the service ready to handle requests?

Checks:
- Temporal connection
- DuckDB availability
- R-Engine availability
- Circuit breaker states

Returns 200 if ready, 503 if not ready.
Kubernetes uses this to route traffic.

QA Engineer: Comprehensive dependency validation
Security Auditor: No sensitive data in responses

Kubernetes-style liveness endpoint (alias for /health).

UX Consultant: Standard Kubernetes naming convention

Kubernetes-style readiness endpoint (alias for /ready).

UX Consultant: Standard Kubernetes naming convention

Detailed system status for monitoring dashboards.

Returns comprehensive system state including:
- All service health
- Circuit breaker metrics
- Version information
- Uptime

ISO Documenter: Structured status for SRE dashboards
List all sources for current tenant.

schema.title: Response List Sources V1 Sources Get

post.description: Trigger data ingestion via Apache Beam/Airbyte.
Trigger data quality checks via Great Expectations.

schema.title: Response List Jobs V1 Jobs Get

post.description: Execute guarded SQL query via Trino.

schema.title: Response List Quota Tiers V1 Governance Quotas Tiers Get

get.description: Get current quota usage for the authenticated tenant.
Get quota limits for the authenticated tenant.

post.description:
Set quota tier for a tenant (admin only).

In production, this requires admin authentication.

schema.title: Response List Presets V1 Presets Get

get.description:
List available KPI SQL templates.

These templates provide standard SQL patterns for common KPI calculations
that can be applied to any compatible dataset.

Args:
    category: Optional filter by category (financial, customer, quality, etc.)

schema.title: Response List Kpi Templates V1 Presets Kpi Templates Get
Response List Kpi Categories V1 Presets Kpi Templates Categories Get

get.description: Get details for a specific KPI template.

post.description:
Render a KPI template with provided parameters.

Returns the generated SQL query ready for execution.

Args:
    template_name: Name of the template to render
    request: Parameters to substitute in the template (table names, column names)

get.description: Get artifact metadata and download URL.

PhD Developer: "Platform of Platforms" pattern.
